name: School of Magic
description:
In School of Magic you have to build a deck with cards and try the combinations to cast the a spell. Every combination generates a new card on your deck making you think what are the best spells to cast.

When you cast a spell you gain score and if you score the total amount before your opponent you win. Every victory allows you to add a new card to your deck.

Each level increases the opponent's difficulty, the objective is to see how far you can go.
